page.title: 02BOXWORTH - HOUSING
page.content: Houses in Boxworth come in four categories; Council rented, private rented, owner occupied and tied. Of the 65 houses, one third are owner occupied, one third tied, 15% Council and the remainder private rented. House building in the past thirty years has been confined to "infill", owner occupied housing. Council housing tends to be terraced. Owner occupied houses built in recent years tend to be large compared to other village houses but most conform to the overall style of houses in Boxworth. No major house building projects have been contemplated,Boxworth has not rated a mention in the County Structure Plan of the 1980's.
